alert.note: Alert for Charlton; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:29PM EDT until June 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Northern Baker County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 729 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Taylor, or 21 miles southeast of Fargo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taylor and St. George. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
